member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1
member.summary: Describes the level of support for HLSL 6.0 wave operations.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1.WaveOps
member.summary: True if the driver supports HLSL 6.0 wave operations.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1.WaveLaneCountMin
member.summary: Specifies the baseline number of lanes in the SIMD wave that this implementation can support. This term is sometimes known as "wavefront size" or "warp width". Currently apps should rely only on this minimum value for sizing workloads.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1.WaveLaneCountMax
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of lanes in the SIMD wave that this implementation can support. This capability is reserved for future expansion, and is not expected to be used by current applications.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1.TotalLaneCount
member.summary: Specifies the total number of SIMD lanes on the hardware.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1.ExpandedComputeResourceStates
member.summary: Indicates transitions are possible in and out of the CBV, and indirect argument states, on compute command lists. If succeeds this value will always be true.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS1.Int64ShaderOps
member.summary: Indicates that 64bit integer operations are supported.
